"Hazy Memories of Yellow Flowers":
"<%me>, I have another flower
request. Let's hope the third time's a charm.
Would you go collect some of the yellow
flowers that the Rappies are fond of?
Matoi has also shown interest in this one.
Unfortunately, I have very little information,
except that the flower is really rare and that
Rappies are fond of it.
I'm sorry to bother you, but I really need your
help with this one."
"おぼろげに残りし黄色の花"

"<%me>さん
三度目の正直のお願いです。
「ラッピー」という稀少生物が好んでいる
黄色い花を集めてきてはもらえませんか？

これも、マトイさんが興味を示した花です。
ただ、今度のものはかなり稀少らしく
「ラッピー」が好んで収集している
という情報以外はあまり……
すみません、よろしくお願いします！"
